The screenshots of the election map from: 339 votes for Joe Biden in Michigan while Donald Trump and other candidates received none.
Right: leaning pundits and politicians circulated these screenshots, claiming potential election fraud in Michigan.
The screenshots were widely shared among: with many claiming they showed proof of fraud or theft by Democrats.
However: it was determined that the influx of votes for Biden was the result of a data error, and not indicative of voter fraud or any nefarious actions by Democrats. The error was noticed and corrected by Decision Desk HQ, and other vote tabulators in Michigan likely experienced similar errors that were corrected in real-time.
